name: Room In Dream
description:
Room In Dream is a relaxing, peaceful, and chill casual game. You can immerse yourself in a Zen and peaceful corner to create your own cozy room. Discover, collect, and assemble a variety of furniture to decorate your little cozy room and surrounding environment, feeling the white noise of nature, time flow and weather change.

Interior Design: Furnish Your Own Little Room.

You can explore, discover and collect interior furniture and various items in the game to decorate your own little room. Small decorations can be placed on large furniture, and different furniture can also be combined. Cute and cozy? Or simply by wooden? You can own all style rooms with your creativity.


Outdoor Space: Create A Zen Outdoor Space

You can choose outdoor furniture, decorations, terrain and other items to decorate the outdoor space. Whether it’s a lively forest camp, a warm and bright garden courtyard, or a gurgling wild pool, it is up to you. The game will continue to update various seasonal unique items and decorations. There are always seasonal items for you to have fun. You can also interact with some items and try to find little surprises in the game!

Interesting and lovely flora and fauna in the ecosystem

The game offers a large number of plants such as flowers and trees that you can choose and place to make your outdoor scenes come alive. Feel the plants grow under your care and experience the picturesque beauty of the different seasons. Try interacting with different plants, perhaps the plants will surprise you! And try to build your own ecosystem, maybe it will attract small guests to visit!



Pomodoro Timer and live wallpaper: Let the game help you

The game supports setting the Pomodoro Timer, which will help you manage your time and let you focus on any tasks. Meanwhile, the game's healing screen, melodious background music and natural white noise can keep you focused and motivated, and it can accompany your work and study. You can choose a variety of aesthetic themes, for example, change the game's background color, day and night and weather changes, as well as choose your own background music and different types of white noise. In the future, the game will support setting the game screen as a live wallpaper, which will allow you to better integrate the game into work and study. Let your own little room accompany you through every day and night of hard work and study, dispel the fatigue of work and study, and let this warm corner heal you every day.
